data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Formosa. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Formosa, Argentina
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Formosa, Argentina and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Formosa who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Formosa, Argentina to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, teach the 53,784 believers in Formosa that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Formosa to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, make the 53,784 believers in Formosa to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 432,816 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
